languages.text: "Я рад, что ты это понял{mf||а}! Правосудие свершится — ты можешь это лишь принять".

traits.locale_text: "Я рад, что ты это понял{mf||а}! Правосудие свершится — ты можешь это лишь принять".

languages.text: "I am glad you have realised this! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."
languages.original_text: "Я рад, что ты это понял{mf||а}! Правосудие свершится — ты можешь это лишь принять".

traits.locale_text: "I am glad you realised that! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."
"I am glad you realised that! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."
"I am glad you realised that! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."
"I am glad you realised that! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."
"I am glad you have realised this! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."
"I am glad you have realised this! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."

languages.text: “我很高兴你意识到了这点！正义终将得到伸张，而你只需要接受就好。”
languages.original_text: "I am glad you have realised this! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴你意识到了这点！正义终将得到伸张，而你只需要接受就好。”

languages.text: 「気が付いてくれて安心した！正義は成し遂げられる。お前に出来るのは、それを受け入れる事だけだ」
languages.original_text: "I am glad you have realised this! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."

traits.locale_text: 「気が付いてくれて安心した！正義は成し遂げられる。お前に出来るのは、それを受け入れる事だけだ」

languages.text: «¡Me alegro de que se haya dado cuenta! Se hará justicia. Lo único que puede hacer es aceptarlo».
languages.original_text: "I am glad you have realised this! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."

traits.locale_text: «¡Me alegro de que se haya dado cuenta! Se hará justicia. Lo único que puede hacer es aceptarlo».

languages.text: "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr das erkannt habt! Der Gerechtigkeit wird genüge getan werden. Ihr könnt nichts weiter tun, als sie zu akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: "I am glad you have realised this! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr das erkannt habt! Der Gerechtigkeit wird genüge getan werden. Ihr könnt nichts weiter tun, als sie zu akzeptieren."

languages.text: « Ravi que vous vous en soyez rendu compte ! Justice sera rendue. Tout ce que nous pouvons faire, c'est l'accepter. »
languages.original_text: "I am glad you have realised this! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."

traits.locale_text: « Ravi que vous vous en soyez rendu compte ! Justice sera rendue. Tout ce que nous pouvons faire, c'est l'accepter. »

languages.text: "Bunu fark ettiğine sevindim! Adalet yerini bulacak. Tek yapabileceğin onu kabullenmek."
languages.original_text: "I am glad you have realised this! Justice will be done. All you can do is to accept it."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu fark ettiğine sevindim! Adalet yerini bulacak. Tek yapabileceğin onu kabullenmek."
